alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Mower (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 24 at 12:57AM CDT until October 24 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Mower County in southeastern Minnesota... Southern Dodge County in southeastern Minnesota... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1257 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Blooming Prairie, or 13 miles southwest of Dodge Center, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hayfield around 100 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Oslo, County Roads 1 And 15, Sargeant, Highway 30 And County 3, County Roads 6 And 15, County Roads 6 And 9, and County Roads 3 And 6. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
